select id as id,menuName as text,parentId as pid from bs_resource where parentId=#{parentId} order by menuOrder asc
mapper.update:
update bs_resource set
menuName = #{menuName},
menuUrl = #{menuUrl},
menuImgPath = #{menuImgPath},
status = #{status},
menuOrder = #{menuOrder},
updated = sysDate() where id = #{id}
